question: What notable water well is located in the heart of Hail?
true_answer: The notable water well located in the heart of Hail is Bi’r Samah.
asked_question_translated: Que poço de água notável está situado no coração de Avé?
answer: O poço de água notável situado no coração de Avé é o Poço de Água da Mesquita do Canhoto.
answer_translated_eng: The remarkable water well located in the heart of Avé is the Water Well of the Left-Handed Mosque.
